explains: n. 撤销管制，解除控制

sentences.en: Since deregulation, banks are permitted to set their own interest rates.
sentences.cn: 解除管制后，银行获准自定利率。

sentences.en: Asian airlines remain untouched by the deregulation that has swept the U.S.
sentences.cn: 亚洲的航空公司没有受到已席卷美国的撤销管制的影响。

sentences.en: In many countries deregulation has helped to drive the process along.
sentences.cn: 在许多国家，撤销管制有助于推动这一进程。
